fields.description:
We need to update the Facebook SDK Module version.

It's almost 1 year old now as per https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_modules/blob/master/facebook/mobile/android/src/com/facebook/FacebookSdkVersion.java we are currently stuck on version 3.0.0 of the Facebook SDK... And there were a lot of improvements since them...

The official Changelog from 3.0.0 to 3.5:
https://developers.facebook.com/docs/android/change-log-3.x/

There are many features and improvements since them, not to mention that the latest 3.5 version brings the Native Share Dialog and a lot of bug fixes
fields.summary: Android: Update Facebook Module to version 3.5

comments.body: Note: The module has been moved to here https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.facebook

Additional info:-
The latest SDK version as of Jan 6, 2015 is Facebook SDK 3.22.0 for Android.

[~penrique]
PR: https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.facebook/pull/2
Document Updates

PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/6690
Binary modules for titanium_mobile

[~penrique]
Module is currently at: https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.facebook
It's been tagged and docs been updated. If everything is in order, could you close this ticket? Thank you.

PRs for Titanium Mobile (Facebook Binaries)
Master: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/6703
3_5_X: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/6704
4_0_X: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/6707

Verified the fix. The facebook module for android has been updated to 4.0.1.
Closing.

Environment:
Appc Studio : 3.5.1.201412091616
Ti SDK : 4.0.0.v20150317234215
CLI : 4.0.0-alpha
Alloy : 1.6.0-alpha
MAC Yosemite : 10.10.2
